channel.title: Static again

item.title: Static again
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

It is saying that isAttackable is a static. Now that is some bullshit… How can I get this
“if (CacheNPCDefinition.getId() == 907)” to make useable in isAttackable()?

public boolean isAttackable() { if (CacheNPCDefinition.getId() == 907) return CacheNPCDefinition.forID(getId()).combatLevel >= 0; else return CacheNPCDefinition.forID(getId()).combatLevel > 0; }

Compiling... src\org\dementhium\model\npc\NPC.java:685: error: non-static method getId() cann ot be referenced from a static context if (CacheNPCDefinition.getId() == 907) ^ src\org\dementhium\model\npc\NPC.java:692: error: non-static method getId() cann ot be referenced from a static context if (CacheNPCDefinition.getId() == 907) ^ 2 errors Complete. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
